text: 12:14 Matyu 26:4; 27:1; Mak 3:6; Luk 6:11; Jon 7:1; 7:19; 11:53Ezɨ Farisiba dɨkavigha God ko mɨgeir dɨpenim ategha uari akuvagha Iesus mɨsoghasa tuaviba buri.12:14 Farisiba ghaze, arɨmariaba a gevir arazim uaghan ingangarir mam, egha Sabatɨn arazir kaba uaghan dar anogoroke. Ezɨ Farisiba gari, Iesus Sabatɨn arɨmariaba agefi, kamaghɨn me a basemegha a mɨsoghasa tuaviba buri. Nɨ Luk 13:14 ko Jon 5:16-18ɨn gan.
